website_summaries.verdict: While it is a little pricier than other maca powders, the quality is high, the side effects are low, and the company goes the extra mile environmentally.
pros: Certified USDA organic, non-GMO, kosher, gluten-free, and Fair Trade
Made from the highest quality sources in the Andes mountains
Company plants a tree for every purchase
cons: Some issues with the resealable pouch and with the powder not mixing well in liquids

customer_reviews.title: Since taking MACA I have realized my level of energy ...
customer_reviews.text: Since taking MACA I have realized my level of energy has increased. My sleep pattern is more sound and lastly skin is glowing. I am 56 and feel 40
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: My hair !!!
customer_reviews.text: OK this is the first review I have left on Amazon. I am 74 years old, female, and I want to tell you, after about a week taking 1/2 teaspoon of this in my tea every day, it's about my hair !! For months I had been losing 2 or 3 brush fulls of hair every day,,,hair thinning and receding at my forehead sides. I noticed that the hair fall has reduced by 80% !!! And hairs growing where receding. If nothing else, become a lifer on this stuff just for your hair ! Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Lenaghan

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to hot flashes and night sweats.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I just started going through menopause and having night sweats and hot flashes. I started taking a teaqqspoon of this in my smoothie in the morning and haven't had a hot flash since. It has been about 6 months now. It hasn't boosted my energy but, that is ok. I don't have to use my little hand held portable fan anymore. Keeping my fingers crossed it keeps on working. I just bought my 3rd bag.
customer_reviews.author: crafty mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the extra mile that this company goes to in order to be a step above. I received an entire digital recipe booklet for Maca shortly after purchasing this product, and it was just because that's what they do. There was no attempt to entice me to purchase, no sales tactics, just a great product followed up with a nice gift -- and they plant a tree, too, for every purchase? I'll surely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: positive review by someone who uses Maca Root
customer_reviews.text: I am use to the malt like flavor of Maca root and when I saw that it was gelatinized I thought it would have a different texture and taste, but the texture was like the root powders I have tried before the taste was not different either. What was important for me was the claim of bio-availability. I use it in my cereals and in protein sports drink mixes
customer_reviews.author: Melvin braswell

customer_reviews.title: Better overall energy as well
customer_reviews.text: This powder is a game changer for hormonal issues. I use it several times a week in my morning smoothie. My monthly cramps are virtually gone (after YEARS of issues). Better overall energy as well. Highly recommend. Great product and company!
customer_reviews.author: C Turner

customer_reviews.title: Tastes and smells absolutely horrendous!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot comment on the effectiveness of this because I couldn't get it down. It smells and tasted disgusting. I tried to mix it in with things to help with the flavor and I couldn't mask it. So then I tried to mix it in a little liquid to just chug it down, but I couldn't do it. I can't even open the bag without gagging. Luckily my coworker also uses Maca and can stomach it so I gave it to her. I'm going to look for a capsule alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product ! I feel better, stronger and younger after taking this . Their commitment " to plant a tree for every product we sell" is another reason for me me to support their product.
customer_reviews.author: Deltium

customer_reviews.title: Excellent source of energy!
customer_reviews.text: Has a really nice flavor, mixes well, good price...I put a tsp full in my coffee in the AM...much more energy since using this product...will definitely keep using this!
customer_reviews.author: Jen in Florida

customer_reviews.title: I made my protein shakes using it and they were good. However
customer_reviews.text: I bought a tin of Maca at a local grocery store and paid through the nose for it while I waited for my order. I made my protein shakes using it and they were good. However, when this Maca arrived and I started using it, wow!! The taste was amazing!!!! I love this Maca and now won't use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!! I only call em’ like I see em’!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 2 months ago. Product has great results. Personally, has helped with alertness and energy. Odor wasn’t as bad as expected from reading some of the reviews. The biggest drawback is finding something tolerable to mix it with. My two favorite options are Greek Vanilla Yogurt for a solid mixture; or mixing / drinking with Squirt soda. Will definitely be a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: OKC PRIME

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff but not cheap...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my pre-workout smoothie. It is a nice addition and does seem to help me push myself harder in the gym. The only reason for 4 out of 5 stars is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Clumps up in liquids, but works well
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant flavor but does get some getting used to. "Butterscotch" is a stretch, but close. For the best flavor, I mix it with one teaspoon of Nestle Instant Cappuccino (decaf) in hot water. I even put a little bit of Benefiber and it tastes quite good. Benefiber is tasteless and completely dissolvable. If combining multiple powders, mix the mana powder first in the bottom of the cup, add hot liquid, then your other powders. Noticed that my PMS symptoms are less each month and period is more regular. At first energy was great but I think I acclimated to it at one tspn per day.
customer_reviews.author: DRN

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Eating healthy on top of it also ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Eating healthy on top of it also but Deffinetly is helping my stress and mental clarity. More vitility. I like to make a macho. Just a mocha but with maca. Taste good and quick and easy to make. Also can make breakfast bars with oats/maple and cinnamon. A lot of great recipes on youtube. Health benefits are out the roof and this is a early review.. But the effects are so sudden i had to haha. I suggest 2 more super foods on top of it for even more increased health but separate. Spirulina and chlorella.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J Marion

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Feeling so much better in just a few days of use.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a sudden surge in energy and calm since taking this product. Only takes a teaspoon to add to food or beverage. I add to my morning protein shake. Can’t taste a difference but I sure can feel the difference. For the price it is worth checking out to see if it can help. I have chronic fatigue syndrome so I was skeptical cause nothing works. But this does. Amazing! High quality product in a quality package. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CBeatty

customer_reviews.title: Made me vomit
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different brands of Maca, gelatinized and regular, and I'm thinking I got a bad batch because I threw up every time I took this. This has never happened to me with Maca and unfortunately this will have to go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Somaya M

customer_reviews.title: Very good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit more mild than others, and does not seem to provoke stomach issues like some other brands, but it is quite pricey. Still has that taste you have to get use to, but that is to be expected, and once you've had it for awhile it actually starts tasting good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Brutal hot flashes!
customer_reviews.text: This product DEFINITELY works, something is gonna happen. However, I think it should only be taken by women already experiencing the effects of menopause, I am not. taking this maca gave me hot flashes from Hell made my period 3 weeks long. for 2 weeks, it literally felt like I was sitting in a volcanoe. I take maca regularly but decided to give gelatinized a try. Big mistake. Like I said, something is gonna happen for sure. Just hope it isn't the hot flashes cause they were BRUTAL!
customer_reviews.author: liberiangrl

customer_reviews.title: Made me really depressed and anxious
customer_reviews.text: I took this daily for a couple weeks and I was sooo anxious and depressed. I couldn't stop crying.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Winters

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time to purchase Maca Powder and I wasn't disappointed. I could feel the energy surge and felt much more endurance throughout the day. Being 72 years young, I can only say where have you been all these years? Thrilled to find it, love the nutty flavor and all the physical benefits it provides. The product arrived on time, in good condition and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: CaroleH

customer_reviews.title: Bad reviews overexaggerate the “bad taste”
customer_reviews.text: It’s not that bad in taste like seriously these people had me thinking it would taste like horse feces. As for effect, it’s still quite early but I’m noticing a slight energy boost and no vomiting another thing bad reviews warn about. It also was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: It’s your choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice, first order was okay but the second order it was so bad had some bugs inside the bag yikes
customer_reviews.author: AleXana

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for its nutritional support and haven't had it long enough to testify to its claims of "vitality, increased stamina etc". However I know that takes time and will be happy to update my review after I've used it for 1 month plus. My ONLY drawback is this does not mix as easily as I'd hoped. I mix by hand and would recommend a blender to incorporate it better without so many clumps. Another plus is the company plants a tree for every purchase! THAT IS AWESOME! We need all the help for this planet we can get!
customer_reviews.author: gapeach

customer_reviews.title: No allergic reaction!
customer_reviews.text: I have several recipes that call for maca and I have tried other brands which were NOT gelatinized but I had a terrible reaction. I have read that many people develop intense itching all over their skin after ingesting raw maca. I was cautious but gave it one more try and this product works with no reaction! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I needed more energy and have added it to my smoothie. It definitely adds energy to my morning. The taste does not influence the smoothie either. I like buying organic and from the best sources, of which Peru is for maca. This is my second purchase and will be a regular for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne/STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! My hormones were so out of control, I couldn't even stand myself! I have been enjoying macca root in my morning smoothies for about two weeks now. It has made an incredible difference. I have more energy and a better attitude. I will be purchasing again !
customer_reviews.author: Christie Wade

customer_reviews.title: Maca Powder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Maca powder. I was reluctant at first because some reviews were not keen on the taste but I like it. My husband says it tastes like peanut butter. I think it has a more earthy nut flavor but works well with cocoa powder and peanut butter powder...YUM. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This maca powder has been a pleasant surprise; easy to use, easily digested - and tasty. I blend it with ground flax and organic turmeric powder, a little lemon and stevia for an energizing, immune-boosting morning drink. Seems to act as an energy booster and I've had no hot flashes since using - both reasons for purchase. They've included a recipe/info 'booklet' attached to an email. It offers other ways to incorporate maca. I haven't tried those yet - but will. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Irritates stomach,.
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions on use. Added to cereal one morning. In 30-40 minutes my stomach had severe pain right in the pit. Had to take anti acid . Some relief, St Mack was sore most of the day. Following morning I boiled it with matcha tee. Wasn’t as bad. That night had to take anti- acid. I’am afraid to try this a third time, not sure if the Maca is contaminated or what. Need to return product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor J. Carro

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Too chunky hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: The product I got was very clumpy. I have a battery operated little stirrer to mix the powder into my orange juice and it just would not mix! So I had to choke down huge chunks which was not pleasant. I have had other Maca powders which I never had a problem with. Also the flavor was not great. I would have returned it but I waited too long and I’m now 2 days past 30 and no longer have the opportunity :(
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: getting better with Maca
customer_reviews.text: I add this daily to my breakfast smoothy. I like the creaminess it adds. Looking for ways to feel better each day.
customer_reviews.author: patricia petryszyn

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the effects of Benefits I receive from using Maca
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the effects of Benefits I receive from using Maca. I noticed improvements in energy, thought processing, as well as mood enhancement within three days of use. I have purchased this organic powder a few days ago and it was delivered quickly, the taste is mild and it mixes well in my juices. The company also states they plant a tree with each purchase. Happy holiday to me!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Taste isn’t the best but you can mask it with bananas. I saw I difference in my menstrual cycles for sure. They became much shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is really good! I put about 1/4 teaspoon in a smoothie
customer_reviews.text: This is really good! I put about 1/4 teaspoon in a smoothie, and I feel energized after drinking it. I will be adding more as I get used to it, but it really doesn't take a lot, and I received a good amount in the package. I'm very pleased, and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DesertZen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, it is already broken down for superior absorbstion. Very professional and courteous company also.
customer_reviews.author: lbdag

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Reduced my hot flashes and mood swings, and energizes! No side effects that I can detect. It does everything it says it does, IMHO. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great sellers...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this, and so far I like it because I like the benefits of it, only I don't care for the smell, but you don't have to smell it. I love coffee smell and taste, and was hoping to substitute that sometimes for this, only to me the smell really does not complement coffee, I get a slight trace of it where I can figure out why some would say that it reminds them of it, but not much. The taste seems to blend in better with the dark chocolate almond milk and banana smoothie, instead of with raspberry and blackberry one. Great customer service and communication! Would buy from the seller, again!
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Good in smoothies/shakes
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’ve been adding these to my morning smoothies and shakes here and there. Sometimes I forget that I have it. I don’t even taste the difference but feel slightly more energized.
customer_reviews.author: Puffin

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag seal causes Maca to go bad - buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: the seal on this bag doesn't close easily, ended up having to throw it out almost completely full, because it wasn't sealed. there was no noticeable improvement in any way from taking this supplement, and it just makes coffee sludge. Buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: MacMaven234

customer_reviews.title: The taste is too much.,
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this stuff. I do think it helped me feel better and have more energy but the taste is so overpowering.. I can’t even mix it with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Anders

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I don't like is the taste
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like is the taste. I guess I will get use to it, but it works and doesn't make my stomach hurt so that's a plus
customer_reviews.author: Honestly :)

customer_reviews.title: Do the Maca-rena
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the product so much it makes we want to dance the Maca-rena!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Schletty

customer_reviews.title: Buy some before they run out!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! Such a great buy! Amazing taste and texture. I have had zero issue with packaging or product. Will buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: mrdrake

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it
customer_reviews.text: Listen there isnt any serving suggestions. This powder is nasty. This doesnt come with a little a pamphlet of what you can mix it with to make it taste better. I emailed the Owners no answer back. Your better off buying these at an actual store it will come with more instructions and or serving suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Nette A

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fine but no noticeable improvement in how I felt.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about the effectiveness of this product. The taste was fine but I really didn’t feel any different after using it over time. Another person might but I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Sapient Son

customer_reviews.title: Tastes full and pleasant
customer_reviews.text: A pleasant tasting Maca powder in practical seal-able packaging. Good size but not too large, so it can be used within a couple of month. I store this in the refrigerator to preserve freshness. The powder appears to be easy to digest. I use it daily in oatmeal. Thank you Soul Organics!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor, Great Taste.
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, great taste. I was skeptical but I’m completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Caslon Cato

customer_reviews.title: Super yummy addition to smoothies
customer_reviews.text: We love putting maca in our smoothies. This product is gelatinized, making it more bioavailable (easier to digest). It has a nice aroma, appears fresh. The powder is very fine, scoop slowly or maca dust will escape. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C and E

customer_reviews.title: Vitality!
customer_reviews.text: Really noticeable increase in vitality from Soul Organics Maca Powder. I put one or two spoonfuls in my smoothies and have noticed an overall boost. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Earle

customer_reviews.title: Powder Everywhere - NOT SEALED DURING SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could comment on the quality of the product with no returns. But instead I have a punctured bag with maca everywhere. Could be a great product... but I will never know. Should have used better bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. I am currently at 1 teaspoon building up to two teaspoons. Adding to my morning muffin. It tastes great..no aftertaste. I want to say that I have more energy and feel better overall. Less anxious, I guess. It's been one week so it might be too early to tell. I noticed that my appetite and cravings are more under control which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa

customer_reviews.title: I put it in my green drinks I make and it's a nice added nuttiness
customer_reviews.text: This is my first try with Maca powder and i must say I'm a fan! I put it in my green drinks I make and it's a nice added nuttiness. The free recipes I received with it was a fabulous added bonus. Def will be ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianamal

customer_reviews.title: but I love the boost
customer_reviews.text: I've only recently discovered Maca Powder, but I love the boost, the taste -- and that this is organic.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L. Eichler

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible, doesn't boost energy!
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing for my energy level and was about as vile tasting as it could be. It also made anything I mixed it with taste terrible. To add insult to injury, it was really difficult to mix.
customer_reviews.author: R. Slone

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this product. If I like, I continue to get.
customer_reviews.author: SJLee

customer_reviews.title: Energy, yes.
customer_reviews.text: So far it does seem to work as a late-day pick-me-up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T. Narcisi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste of the nutty flavor that adds to my smoothies. I have enjoyed adding it to my drinks in the morning and I can see a big difference in my overall health. I would def recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Maeda de Earl

customer_reviews.title: The taste of Maca Root
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using the product for one week but even after that short period of time I notice increased alertness and I feel less tired during the day. I use the Maca Root in my daily smoothie as well mixed in with a bowl of oatmeal. The taste took a couple of days to get used to but now I don’t even notice it. Seems to be all that is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Magruder

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: I know in herbalism, herbs that are roots need to be boiled to be well absorbed and effective. So it made sense to me that Gelatinized Maca would be better absorbed. And, in my experience with the product so far, I do feel that I get more energy from this than I was getting from high quality raw maca. I really think this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: I love this Maca Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this Maca Powder. Great taste and nice packaging. I also loved that the owner cared enough to reach out to me via email to make sure I loved their product; not many companies will do that....nice touch. I will keep buying this product. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pamelac

customer_reviews.title: Taste isn't too bad. I put it in my oatmeal for breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using Maca powder for about 3 weeks now. I do feel more energetic throughout the day. Taste isn't too bad. I put it in my oatmeal for breakfast. I will say not to take it mid to late afternoon for it will keep you up later than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica O

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy! Wow. My wife uses this in smoothies daily. I can't believe the price. I need to order more
customer_reviews.author: rich simon

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even have to write a review just Che knout my instagram page and you’ll see the results and you judge how great this product is. @muscle_and_gains
customer_reviews.author: Domani F.

customer_reviews.title: Taste is strong
customer_reviews.text: Taste is a little strong. Not sure if it works as well as the previous product I used. Will have to see.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Harper

customer_reviews.title: Maca Powder
customer_reviews.text: I add this powder to my smoothies that I make with my homemade kefir. I’ve usd the product 3 times so far. It tastes wonderful and pure. I particularly like that the company plants a tree for every product they sell. I will definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Denny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time I enjoy a tablespoon in my protein shake. Tastes great and a nice source of carbs
customer_reviews.author: J. Carlon

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is not bad. Malt like
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is not bad. Malt like. Exactly what it should taste like. I'm still experimenting with how I'd like to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. It has helped regulate my bowl activity and I feel I sleep better and more. The fact that they plant a tree for every product sold says wonderful things about them. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: luckylpg

customer_reviews.title: I've only tried this brand but I really like it. I also feel more energetic and happier
customer_reviews.text: The gelatinized kind of maca is gentle on my stomach. I've only tried this brand but I really like it. I also feel more energetic and happier.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Missing boik
customer_reviews.text: So far I enjoy it. But recipe book was not included in order as stated
customer_reviews.author: K Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like the nutty,buttery flavor. It's filling and satisfying. Since I generally feel good all the time, I haven't noticed any difference w/this product in that area. However, since it's so nutritious, I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I mix with almond milk and cinnamon in the morning. Also take chlorella/spirulina tablets and Kifir probiotic. Noticeable clean energy to power through my day. Gelatinized is the way to go btw.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: You better order two bags at a time!
customer_reviews.text: The best maca I’ve had and I’ve been using maca since before it was popular! I especially like creamy maple-like finish!
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality
customer_reviews.text: Fine product. Dissolves well in hot water. Like to mix it with my Dandy Blend drink.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love our spoonful of Maca Powder in our morning homemade cereal. Great taste and gives us energy.
customer_reviews.author: Iris67

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: So far my favorite Maca Powder. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hype about the potential of what this product ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of hype about the potential of what this product is suppose to do. For me, it does nothing. smh
customer_reviews.author: Jimer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference after 4 days. I'm not as tired which of course makes you irritable when you have little ones. I also noticed that I'm refreshed in the morning instead of dragging out of bed. I'm pushing 50 and my libido is better! My husband is so grateful! :-) I hope these effects last!
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: "Gelentinized"
customer_reviews.text: Great Product ! The Fact that it was Gelatinized was critical as it is readily absorbed into drinks etc. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: jimmiegreenjeans

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the price was excellent, the product was organic and pure and I use some every day in oateal or smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful stuff. I am new to Maca and have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful stuff. I am new to Maca and have slowly increased my dose over the last two weeks. Now that it is kicking in, I am feeling very energized and vital. I actually traded emails with Soul Organics about how to use it, and they were very helpful & responsive! They suggested up the dose since I exercise a lot. Taste Great.
customer_reviews.author: SmartMoney

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: This was the second brand of maca powder that we tried, and it's great! Maybe the fact that it's gelatinized is the difference, but we are very happy with this purchase, and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: A good way to get all the health benefits Maca provides
customer_reviews.text: I put this powder in my pancakes and smoothies . It mixes well, never caking. I don't really notice a difference in the flavor though others might. A good way to get all the health benefits Maca provides.
customer_reviews.author: Happywife

customer_reviews.title: Maca Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great energy boosting product. It really kick starts my day. I use a teaspoon in my protein shake before A workout. And might I add that it has boosted my sex life as well. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely seems to help balance hormones! No cramps and ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely seems to help balance hormones! No cramps and period bloating/pain, since I started adding this product to my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: added to smoothie
customer_reviews.text: i have added this to my morning smoothie along with chia seeds. I do not experience anything bad from the add. I do not notice a taste from the powder either. Blends in well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is very palatable and easily digested. I put it in coffee or any other drink. You only take a tablespoon at a time, so this will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: MamaHow

customer_reviews.title: Was Leary at first purchasing but actually is wonderful. I feel great
customer_reviews.text: Was Leary at first purchasing but actually is wonderful. I feel great, energized and tastes decent in soups and rice. Also use in my coffee in morning but not to add to much cause it’s an aquired taste. But love it and will be purchasing again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Dustina

customer_reviews.title: but after doing my research (prior to buying) I am glad I made this purchase from Soul Organics
customer_reviews.text: “I haven't had the opportunity to try Maca powder from other brands, but after doing my research (prior to buying) I am glad I made this purchase from Soul Organics. I'm trying to change my diet and after several weeks of using Maca Powder everyday, I do feel better and a little less tired mid-day. I can't speak to how others may feel, but I'm definitely keeping it in my diet. Thank you!“
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Hay

customer_reviews.title: Great Libido Booster!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I mix it into my protein drink every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived on time and the quality of the propduct was excellent. The powder has a mild nutty flavor
customer_reviews.text: Seller was very prompt with my order. The product arrived on time and the quality of the propduct was excellent. The powder has a mild nutty flavor. Delicious by itself or in your favorite smoothy.
customer_reviews.author: Baewatch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use this maca powder daily in smoothies and I really like the flavour. It definitely energises me. I am a big fan of the fact that a tree is planted with every purchase. It's also organic and non-GMO.
customer_reviews.author: Dom P

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great, gives me energy without caffeine (which I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Who needs caffeine? This stuff is great, gives me energy without caffeine (which I can't have anymore). I only use half a teaspoon instead of a full teaspoon and it gives me the stamina to get through a long day without that strung out limp rag feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made me extremely jittery and can't use the whole bag now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ross

customer_reviews.title: jelly like, is strong
customer_reviews.text: Its gelatine effect, jelly like, is strong. Use it sparingly in the beginning as you get used to it. I am not in a position to offer a perspective on it because this is the first Maca powder I have ever used. It seems to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Pradip Parekh

customer_reviews.title: Slit in the bag of Macca powder
customer_reviews.text: The bag had a slit on the front of it so I am very reluctant to use it I asked the company to replace it and they directed me to you
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Add it to my smoothie every morning. Helps with energy and attitude.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Huchel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy this again
customer_reviews.text: The package had a hole in it and it was all over my other things.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Powder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I add to my morning smoothie...no bitter taste or grittiness. Love all the great benefits!
customer_reviews.author: ktangelic

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my morning shakes and no bake bars. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Huldra

product_meta.title: Soul Organics Maca Powder - USDA Organic and Gelatinized for Enhanced Bio-availability, 1 Pound
feature_bullets: ✔️ ENJOY MACA AT IT'S PUREST - Soul Organics Maca Powder is USDA Certified Organic, is always fresh, GMO-Free, Kosher and Vegan friendly

✔️ TRY RISK FREE! We are happy to offer what we call our "Super Unbreakable Never-Ending Guarantee." Try our maca and if you aren't satisfied we will offer you the choice of 100% of your money back, or a free replacement product, whichever if you prefer!

✔️ WHAT IS MACA? - Organic Maca powder comes from the Peruvian Maca root, grown high up in the Andes Mountains. After harvest, the Maca root is dried and ground into fine powder. The Ancient Inca used it for it's energy producing and hormone balancing effects
✔️ GET THE MOST OUT OF YOUR MACA - Gelatinizing (heating) the Maca breaks up the starch, making it more concentrated, digestible and bio-available

✔️ GET MORE DONE WITH YOUR DAY - Maca powder is a natural energy booster, the iron and copper it contains are essential for the formation of the red blood cells and the vitamin C, potassium, and calcium it contains combine for a natural energy boost
